### Beetles
```{r beetles}
source("../R/SubModel1_BarkBeetles.R")
options(scipen = 9999)

beetles = data.frame(year = 2010:2100,
                     time = 1:91,
                     r_max = seq(from=1.16,to=2,length.out=91),
                     pop = rep(NA,91),
                     climate_coeff = seq(from=0.8,to=1,length.out=91))

r_0 = 1.16
K = 10000000
N_0 = 500

for(i in 2:nrow(beetles)){
  beetles[1,4] = N_0
  beetles[i,4] = beetles$climate_coeff[i]*beetle_pop(beetles$pop[i-1],r=beetles$r_max[i],K=K)
}

plot(beetles$time,beetles$pop)
```
